proverbs.title: Pilot
proverbs.proverb: Look to the north. Keep looking. There is nothing coming from the south.

proverbs.title: Glow Cloud
proverbs.proverb: Men are from Mars. Women are from Venus. Earth is a hallucination. Podcasts are dreams.

proverbs.title: Station Management
proverbs.proverb: There's a special place in Hell. It's really hip. Very exclusive.

proverbs.title: PTA Meeting
proverbs.proverb: What has four legs in the morning, two legs at noon, and three legs in the evening? I don't know, but I trapped it in my bedroom. Send help.

proverbs.title: The Shape in Grove Park
proverbs.proverb: A million dollars isn't cool. You know what's cool? A basilisk.

proverbs.title: The Drawbridge
proverbs.proverb: Lost? Confused? Lacking direction? Need to find a purpose in your life?

proverbs.title: History Week
proverbs.proverb: It must be 3:23 PM somewhere, maybe space?

proverbs.title: The Lights in Radon Canyon
proverbs.proverb: We are living in an immaterial world, a ghost world, and I am an immaterial girl, a ghost.

proverbs.title: "PYRAMID"
proverbs.proverb: "Nice bolo tie" is the greatest compliment a person can ever receive.

proverbs.title: Feral Dogs
proverbs.proverb: Eating meat is a difficult moral decision, because it's stolen, that meat. You should apologize.

proverbs.title: Wheat & Wheat By-Products
proverbs.proverb: Today is the last day of your life, up to this point.

proverbs.title: The Candidate
proverbs.proverb: Does the carpet match the drapes? No. It doesn't. You're the worst interior decorator. Please leave my home.

proverbs.title: A Story About You
proverbs.proverb: I'd never join a PEN 15 club that would allow a person like me to become a member.

proverbs.title: The Man in the Tan Jacket
proverbs.proverb: Biologically speaking, we are all people made up of smaller people.

proverbs.title: Street Cleaning Day
proverbs.proverb: One incorporeal being said to the other, "I'm not here too. Make friends?"

proverbs.title: The Phone Call
proverbs.proverb: If I said you had a beautiful body, would it even matter, because we are so insignificant in this vast and incomprehensible universe?

proverbs.title: Valentine
proverbs.proverb: Werner Herzog is the most interesting person.

proverbs.title: The Traveler
proverbs.proverb: Find more ways to work "plinth" into daily conversation.

proverbs.title: The Sandstorm
proverbs.proverb: Step one, write down the names of everyone you know. Step two, rearrange the letters. Step three, this will reveal a great secret of time.

proverbs.title: The Sandstorm
proverbs.proverb: Step one, separate your lips. Step two, use facial muscles to pull back corners of mouth. Step three, widen your eyes. This is how to be happy.

proverbs.title: Poetry Week
proverbs.proverb: Pain is just weakness leaving the body, and then being replaced by pain. Lots of pain.

proverbs.title: A Memory of Europe
proverbs.proverb: Ask your doctor if right is left for you.

proverbs.title: The Whispering Forest
proverbs.proverb: If you love someone, set them free. Set them free now. This is the police, and we have you surrounded.

proverbs.title: Eternal Scouts
proverbs.proverb: Mamas, don't let your babies grow up to be cowboys. Show them pictures of cows when they're young and administer brief electrical shocks.

proverbs.title: The Mayor
proverbs.proverb: The most dangerous game is man. The most entertaining game is Broadway Puppyball. The most esoteric game is weird bear.

proverbs.title: One Year Later
proverbs.proverb: A fun game - say 'toy boat' over and over. Do it for the rest of your life. Retreat from society and live on alms. Whisper 'toy boat' as you die.

proverbs.title: Faceless Old Woman
proverbs.proverb: The human soul weighs 21 grams, smells like grilled vegetables, looks like a wrinkled tartan quilt, and sounds like bridge traffic.

proverbs.title: First Date
proverbs.proverb: Production oversight by Tory Malatea, who is holding a small locket. He's not speaking, he'd just like for you to touch the locket. His hand is twisted, his skin is forming into scales. Just touch it once. Just once, okay?

proverbs.title: Summer Reading Program
proverbs.proverb: A bar walks into a bar. The bartender is a snake eating its own tail. The windows look out only onto the face of the one who looks.

proverbs.title: Subway
proverbs.proverb: Your body is a temple, a temple of blood rituals and pagan tributes. A lost temple. A temple that needs more calcium. You should maybe try vitamin supplements.

proverbs.title: Dana
proverbs.proverb: Look to the sky. You will not find answers there, but you will certainly see what everyone is screaming about.

proverbs.title: A Blinking Light Up On the Mountain
proverbs.proverb: Throw your hands in the air. Now your arms. Keep detaching limbs and throwing them in the air. Hopefully the birds will be sated and leave.

proverbs.title: Yellow Helicopters
proverbs.proverb: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but words will never quite describe the pain.

proverbs.title: Cassette
proverbs.proverb: You can lead a horse to water, and you can lead a horse into water, and you can swim around with the horse and have fun.

proverbs.title: A Beautiful Dream
proverbs.proverb: Thank you for your interest in a life free of pain. We are not accepting applications at this time. Please try again, and again, and again, and again, and again, and again, and again, and again, and again...

proverbs.title: Lazy Day
proverbs.proverb: On this day in history, mundanity and terror and food and love and trees.

proverbs.title: Missing
proverbs.proverb: Look, up in the sky! It's a bird! It's a plane! No, it's just the void, infinite and indifferent. We are so small, so very very small.

proverbs.title: The Auction
proverbs.proverb: Listen, I'm not a hero. The real heroes are the people who point out to us when protesters have smartphones, thus invalidating all concerns.

proverbs.title: Orange Grove
proverbs.proverb: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single command from a satellite-activated mind control chip.

proverbs.title: The Woman from Italy
proverbs.proverb: Your Bitcoin address is your middle name, followed by the name of your first pet, and the first street you lived on.

proverbs.title: The Deft Bowman
proverbs.proverb: You can't get blood from a turnip. Listen…you need some blood? I can totally get you some blood. Set that turnip down and follow me to the blood. There's a lot of blood.

proverbs.title: Condos
proverbs.proverb: All tattoos are temporary tattoos.

proverbs.title: WALK
proverbs.proverb: Please move your brain so we can get to the drugs. And stop leaving it there. We've talked about this.

proverbs.title: Numbers
proverbs.proverb: Ignore all the haters telling you that everything isn't a sandwich. Everything is a sandwich.

proverbs.title: Visitor
proverbs.proverb: You won't sleep when you're dead, either.

proverbs.title: Cookies
proverbs.proverb: At your smallest components, you are indistinguishable from a forest fire.

proverbs.title: A Story About Them
proverbs.proverb: Knock, knock. Who’s there? Orange. Orange who? Orange you glad I didn’t say your mother’s in the hospital? I’m sorry. I’m so sorry. Is there anything I can do? Listen, I’ll drive you over there. We’ll leave right now. Grab a coat, it’s a little cold out. I’m so sorry.

proverbs.title: Mayoral Debate
proverbs.proverb: Knock, knock. Who’s there? Orange. Orange who? Orange you glad I didn’t say your mother’s in the hospital? I’m sorry. I’m so sorry. Is there anything I can do? Listen, I’ll drive you over there. We’ll leave right now. Grab a coat, it’s a little cold out. I’m so sorry.

proverbs.title: Parade Day
proverbs.proverb: If you love something, set it free. If it starts flying around and chirping, it was probably a bird.

proverbs.title: Company Picnic
proverbs.proverb: There’s a difference between your, you’re, and yarn. Yarn isn’t even pronounced the same way. It’s a completely different word.

proverbs.title: Renovations
proverbs.proverb: Feeling lost? Like you have no goal in life? Like you're covered in dirt and wet leaves? Like you're an earthworm? Are you an earthworm? Kind sounds like you're an earthworm, actually.
